actions.text: Amendment SA 663 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 172.

Amendment SA 663 proposed by Senator Breaux. (consideration: CR S6434-6435; text: CR S6434) To provide reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2004.
